divs: Sighting DetailsIt was at about 500ft at an unknown distance (maybe 50-100 miles, we are unsure). Another friend texted saying they could see it from Alton, Hampshire which is 100 miles away and a 2 and a half hour drive. It was flashing red green and white very quickly. A plane flew past during the sighting but the object was still in the same place and never moved, definetly not a plane or helicopter.
Summary: red, green and white flashing lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bridgwater
This sighting has never been favorited.
